Clean Water and Sanitation.reasoning: There is no mention of water resources, sanitation, hygiene, or related environmental topics in the course description or schedule.

Affordable and Clean Energy.reasoning: The course content does not address energy production, consumption, renewable energy, or energy efficiency in any capacity.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reasoning: The course explicitly states programming is an 'indispensable basic ability for all walks of life,' directly contributing to skill development for decent work and economic participation.
